message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $18,000.  I think it will be very valuable for you. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $15,000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $12,000 is too low for me.  Could you consider $14,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $14,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $13,000?
